local_intent: Lift the grasped lid by +Z using MoveDelta(z, 0.1 m) to clear the pot.
assumptions: Lid is already grasped before the lift.
Upward +Z path is collision-free for 0.1 m.
Grasp should remain stable after the lift.
coherence_with_global: Matches transfer step after Pick: raise the lid vertically before placing.
